resources.string: Pull down to enter the private space
Release to enter the private space
Some features aren\'t available without Root/Su permission
Are you sure you want to restart now %1$s?
The module isn\'t activated yet. Please check if LSPosed is enabled. If so, please restart or re-optimize the module.
Failed to end process. Please check if HyperCeiler has been granted Root/Su permissions.
Failed to start activity. Please check if HyperCeiler has been granted Root/Su permissions.
The target app isn\'t running and doesn\'t need to be restarted.
Reboot failed. Please check if HyperCeiler has been granted Root/Su permission.

The new version of resource hooking delivers improved performance for resource injection. However, it may still present some issues and is intended for testing purposes only.\nNote: Enabling or disabling this feature requires a device restart to take effect.
A fatal error occurred in the module
Press and hold the content to copy
HyperCeiler was unexpectedly closed. To help us fix this, provide the information below:\n\nPress and hold any message to copy everything.
%1$s has entered Safe mode due to multiple crashes, and HyperCeiler features has been temporarily disabled.
%1$s is still in Safe mode and HyperCeiler features has been disabled. Disable Safe mode?
Tip: Here is the default tip. If you can see me, it means that there\'s a problem with HyperCeiler. Please report it to the developer in a timely and effective manner.
The source of the ROM you\'re using may not be an official Xiaomi ROM, and some features may not work. Please contact your supplier for more details.

The Xposed framework you\'re currently using may cause some features to malfunction. If you experience these issues, try using a different version of the Xposed framework and check if the issue persists.
The current device is running on a system version that isn\'t (fully) adapted, which may result in anomalies in the HyperCeiler functionality.
The signature verification failed, and the current version you\'re using may not be from the official version of HyperCeiler, and may contain malicious code.

Safe mode can unhook some apps in time when they crash multiple times to ensure security. This feature requires the System Framework hook scope to run. We strongly recommend checking the System Framework scope to turn on Safe mode.
You can select text after long or double press, or copy it and send it back to the developer.
Today is HyperCeiler\'s birthday!\nThank you for your support over the past year, and let\'s continue to work together this year!
Today in history: Sevtinge delivered an important speech on July 14, 2022.
The current device log service is abnormal and HyperCeiler features will be limited. Please restore the log service so that it can run normally.\nError code: %1$s
The current device log service is abnormal and HyperCeiler features will be limited. Please restore the log service so that it can run normally.
This feature isn\'t supported in the current system version
This feature is officially supported in the current system version
The current feature is under development, stay tuned.
This is an Easter egg notification
Please enable notifications in Settings to see the Easter eggs
Wow, you actually found this place, that\'s amazing!
Damn, will I be found even if I hide hereâ€¦
There are no Android eggs here, but there are HyperCeiler eggs!

After uninstalling HyperCeiler, the module configuration remains in the Xposed framework database. To remove it completely, first go to the module settings and reset the module configuration, then uninstall.

The current target scope source may not be official Xiaomi. For security reasons, all functions of this scope have been disabled. Please try switching to an app package released by official Xiaomi, or go to "HyperCeiler Settings - Developer options - Debug mode" to specify the mounted version and try again.

This option is only used to correctly handle the mounted version of the target app and should be used only when necessary.\nFor the app being debugged, functionality cannot be guaranteed. If you enable this, please **do not report** any issues that occur with that target app to the developer.

The current target scope is in debug mode. If not necessary, please go and turn it off.
Current app version: %1$s
Selected target version: %2$s
Successfully hooked: %3$s
A version number that is too high will still be blocked, so please fill it in carefully.
